Braccio Robotico 5 Assi WIP

Work in Progress — cycloidal drive experiments, mechanics and motion tests.

1) Concept & Goal

This sketch shows the final concept of the 5-axis robotic arm. The objective is a compact, modular structure focused on cycloidal drives and reliable, repeatable motion.

2) Cycloidal Drive Iterations

Multiple cycloidal gear prototypes printed to test geometry, tolerances and assembly. Each iteration helped refine smoothness, backlash and strength.

3) Cycloidal Movement Test

Close-up test showing only the cycloidal movement, used to evaluate smoothness and mechanical behavior.

4) Current State: Shoulder & Elbow

Current build status showing shoulder and elbow assemblies. The next steps focus on rigidity improvements and integration of the remaining axes.

5) Arm Motion Test

Full arm motion test used to verify joint alignment, movement fluidity and overall mechanical stability.
